Go to https://github.com/Oleg-N-Cher/OfrontPlus-bootstrap/

Download the latest "master" branch archive from this repository.

For a 64-bit OS we are interested in the unix-88 folder.

Everything there is in one pile, but for simplicity you copy all these files to youl local Obj and Lib/Obj.

Then run Lib/Bin/cc and Bin/cc

After that you can of course clean the Obj folders of unnecessary files. Then rebuild Ofront+ with Bin/build and libraries with Lib/Bin/build
